des: "I got bored with apple cider and decided to 'spice' it up with a few of my favorite liquors. It's sure to warm you up on a cold night!"
ins: Stir the cider, rum, and cinnamon schnapps together in a pitcher. Place 2 ice cubes in each of two 12-ounce glasses. Pour half of the cider mixture into each glass and serve.
